name: B42
description: Pentadactyl inspired browser based Brave/muon and clojurescript.

scripts.watch-main: clj -m cljs.main -t node -O none -o app/main.js -w src -c app.main.core
scripts.watch-renderer: clj -m cljs.main -t node -O none -o app/renderer.js -w src -c app.renderer.core

author: Pankaj Doharey <pankajdoharey@gmail.com>
Alex Johnson <github.com/notalex>
